txt.en: 'But I am no coward, and I am ready to play my part in this foolhardy scheme. Are you as prepared as Ayorzén the Courageous?'
Talk to Ayorzén on the uppermost tier of Minas Morgul and complete 'Instance: Gothmog's Rage'
'I will do my best to get you beyond the guardians of the tower, [placeholder], but I will not die for you.\n\n'We will meet back here if we get separated.'
'I sense the presence of my bones, [placeholder]! They are nearby!'
Talk to the shade of Isildur in Barad Cúron
Ayorzén is on the uppermost tier of Minas Morgul, willing to help you gain access to the Tower of the Crescent Moon.
The nearby presence of Isildur's bones has allowed his shade to assume physical form in Barad Cúron.
The time has come to deal with Gothmog. With Ayorzén's help, you hope to gain access to the Tower of the Crescent Moon and your long-time foe hiding within.
